original: Bohe, John A., advokat, Värnamo, f. 30/4/15 i Landskrona. G. 45 m. Karin Menander. Barn: Måns f. 46. — Stud:ex. v. Lunds priv. elem:lärov. 35, jur. kand. i Lund 42. Tingstjg. v. Östbo o. Västbo doms. 42-44. Bitr. jur. h. adv. 45-46, eg. adv :verksamh. i Värnamo fr. 46. Led. av Sv:es adv:-samf. fr. 47.
translated: Bohe, John A., lawyer, Värnamo, b. 30/4/15 in Landskrona. Married in 1945 to Karin Menander. Children: Måns b. 1946. Completed his secondary education at Lund's Private Elementary School in 1935, and received his law degree from Lund University in 1942. Served as a legal clerk in the Östbo and Västbo District Courts from 1942-1944. Became a junior lawyer in 1945-1946, and established his own law practice in Värnamo from 1946 onward. He was a member of the Swedish Bar Association starting in 1947.
